dependencies.description:
AUGUSTUS is a program that predicts genes in eukaryotic genomic
sequences
dependencies.name: augustus

dependencies.description: Short read aligner for DNA and RNA-seq data.

dependencies.description:
HMMER is used for searching sequence databases for sequence homologs,
and for making sequence alignments. It implements methods using
probabilistic models called profile hidden Markov models (profile HMMs).
dependencies.name: hmmer

dependencies.description:
MetaEuk is a modular toolkit designed for large-scale gene discovery and
annotation in eukaryotic metagenomic contigs.
dependencies.name: metaeuk

dependencies.description: Fast, reliable protein-coding gene prediction for prokaryotic genomes.
dependencies.name: prodigal

dependencies.description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.
dependencies.name: py-biopython

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description: SEPP stands for SATe-enabled phylogenetic placement
dependencies.name: sepp

description:
Assesses genome assembly and annotation completeness with Benchmarking
